scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:docs && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es
scripts.build:watch: echo 'build && watch the COMMONJS version of the package - for other version, run specific tasks' && npm run build:commonjs:watch
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/rollup src/AutoSuggest.js --config --sourcemap --output dist/AutoSuggest.js
scripts.build:umd:docs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/rollup src/AutoSuggest.js --config --sourcemap --output docs/AutoSuggest.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup src/AutoSuggest.js --config --output dist/AutoSuggest.min.js
